descriptions.overview: Allen + Roth deep seating set of 6 seats, cushions are in Sunbrella fabric, which are weather, mildew and stain-resistant for lasting outdoor durability.
list: Rust-resistant aluminum frame with an all-weather wicker withstands the outdoor elements for use season after season
Tan fabric complements the chocolate hue, bringing bright charm to your backyard
Solid Acrylic cushions are weather, mildew and stain-resistant for lasting outdoor durability
Coordinate with slat top table from the Northborough collection to complete your look
5-year frame warranty and 5-year Sunbrella fabric warranty give you peace of mind

specs.title: Ottoman Dimensions (L x W x H)
Sofa Dimensions (W x D x H)
Loveseat Dimensions (W x D x H)
Coffee Table Dimensions (L x W x H)
Side Table Dimensions (L x W x H)
Chair Dimensions (W x D x H)

reviews.title: "Beautiful Conversation Set"
reviews.text: This set is very well made and the price was just right. The fabric color is a beautiful light beige and goes with just about any other colors with decor. We're big fans of the wicker look and we love having all these pieces. We can use the ottomans for extra seating or put trays on it and use it as a side table. The cushions are firm but thick and comfortable. This set looks great with the fire pit also purchased from Lowe's. I would definitely buy this set again.  It's a good thing they were out of them or I probably would have. Life is good.
reviews.author: Mitomopa

reviews.title: "Great Investment"
reviews.text: These patio pieces were perfect for our backyard.  They are very durable. only negatives: the corners on some pieces were slightly damaged upon arrival.  If you accidentally leave the cushions out in the rain they are like sponges and it take many days for them to dry out.
reviews.author: Alyssa

reviews.title: "Great fit, not too bulky"
reviews.text: Purchased with install and delivery.  Everything worked out great and quite punctual.  Fit perfectly in a smaller area.  Furniture has already endured some rain and held up really well.
reviews.author: Rob

reviews.title: "Piece came in broken received all in a box"
reviews.text: When I opened and unloaded the box and started to assemble parts are broken
reviews.author: Tony

reviews.title: "Love it!"
reviews.text: Gorgeous set, exactly what I was looking for. So glad they got it back in stock!
reviews.author: Praches

reviews.title: "Love"
reviews.text: We love the look of our new furniture!
reviews.author: Ali

reviews.title: "Beautiful Conversation Set"
reviews.text: Purchased this set (4/15/18) after seeing it in the store.  I expected a 10 day wait, but it arrived on the 20th.  I asked the delivery guys to put the box on my back porch, so I wouldn't have to drag each piece back their on my own.  They said no problem and they even called me once they had delivered it.  After spending weeks looking at various conversation sets, this was definitely  the most comfortable set I sat on.  The cushions are thick yet not overly firm.  An added advantage is the sunbrella covers on the cushions.  Oh, and the covers can be removed for easy cleaning. The color is beautiful and goes with any decor.  My only concern when ordering it was that I would have to put it together.  Well, that was not worth the time I spent worrying.  I got the whole thing put together in less than 2 hours, by myself.  The ottomans come assembled.  I am extremely pleased with this and would recommend it to anyone looking for fairly inexpensive outdoor furniture.
reviews.author: Ryan

reviews.title: "LOVE!"
reviews.text: We purchased this furniture online and had it delivered. Easy to assemble! Probably took 45 mins to assemble all pieces. Super comfortable! The cushions are not thin, hard and flat like most outdoor furniture. Very thick and comfortable to sit on. Looks beautiful, seats 6. HAPPY HAPPY HAPPY!
reviews.author: Jerseygirl

reviews.title: "Patio Set"
reviews.text: This patio set is well made and comfortable. Glad I bought it.
reviews.author: Rudy

reviews.title: "Better than I expected!"
reviews.text: We have a small patio and I wanted a place that people could lounge but also eat. There arent many sets that do that. I looked at multiple sites and for the price point and overall ratings I felt this set was the best. We have been quite happy with the product. I set it up and there were a few bolt holes that didn't line up properly but I just am persistent and undo other that I have already bolted to move the holes more into alignment. We have used it multiple times since purchasing and its quite comfortable- cushions are firm but not overly so. The rattan is nice and the frames are very substantial. Haven't had any problem with cushions blowing away - they arent attached to the frames but seem heavy enough to not blow off unless we actually had wind.
reviews.author: Kimberly

reviews.title: "Love this set!"
reviews.text: It fits perfectly in my space. The cushions are durable and the furniture weather proof from the Florida sun/rain.
reviews.author: Brenda

reviews.title: "My Awesome Deck"
reviews.text: This is my first resin wicker patio set. It was very easy to assemble and looks great.  I have been enjoying my outside living space all day.
reviews.author: Vee

reviews.text: When the huge box arrived and I saw the packing I knew great care was taken with this set. I had a helper put this together without a problem. I couldn't be happier with this purchase. It made my patio into a staycation and I love entertaining on such comfortable furniture. I couldn't recommend it more and for the price it's far more attractive than many others I have seen at far more. Do yourself a favor and buy this!!
reviews.author: Debby

reviews.title: "Great product!"
reviews.text: Easy assembly and great product. Very comfortable...
reviews.author: Becker

reviews.title: "The sunbrella cushions are nice at least..."
reviews.text: Bought this set online after seeing it in store. Felt better about buying it after actually seeing it in person.The cushions are nice sunbrella as expected but the hardware and mounts on the furniture framing at absolute garbage. I had multiple screws threaded to "finger tight" that stripped out the threaded mount after less than a full turn with the small provided Allen wrench.Had to visit the hardware store for a handful of bolts to use in the areas that the mounts failed.Nice set once it's together but the instructions and hardware left a lot to be desired.
reviews.author: D

reviews.title: "Nice set for the money"
reviews.text: This set is very nice for the money. It was very easy to put together. One piece was damaged but the store exchanged the piece that was damaged.
reviews.author: Lowescustomer1

reviews.title: "Trouble with assemby"
reviews.text: Bought the 5 piece set today 01/13/19.I spent about 2 hours trying to assembleIt. I had no trouble with the chairs, but theLove seat just wouldnt come together.The threaded holes on either end wouldn,t alinewith bolt holes. So i guess I'll have to drill theholes to aline. Poor quality control, I shouldn'thave to do this with the amount of money I'vespent.I'm hoping that this is the only problem I'llhave with the set.  For this reason I'm notrecommending the product.
reviews.author: Al

reviews.title: "Love it! - tips on assembly"
reviews.text: I love this set - it looks so nice on my patio!  I wanted a cushioned conversation set, but I don't have enough room for that plus a dining set.  Add the matching dining table to this set and voila - I have both.  The pieces are large and comfortable in my opinion, but still lightweight and easy to move.  The set is very versatile, as the ottomans can be used as extra seating.  The cushions are firm but comfortable, Sunbrella fabric (yay!), and zippered.  As for my assembly tips...  trying to put this together using the little allen wrench that comes with the set is difficult.  My advice - get out your ratcheting socket wrench and buy a hex socket bit for it.  Take along one of the bolts to the hardware store so you're sure you get the right size socket.  SO much easier.  My other tip is that you shouldn't completely tighten up the bolts until you have them all started about halfway.  If I tightened one section all the way, then the next piece wouldn't line up easily.  Once I loosened them, then I could get the other pieces lined up and attached.  Once it's all together, then go around and alternate tightening up all the bolts on the piece.  Hope this helps others assembling their purchase...I'm very happy with mine.
reviews.author: Debbie

reviews.title: "nice patio set"
reviews.text: Nice patio set , directions to construct not too detailed. I will tell anyone else when you are putting it together , not to tighten the fastener screws until its all together , then tighten them all up. If you tighten them as you go along you will have trouble lining up the sections. If you do this you will not have any trouble.
reviews.author: Pete

reviews.title: "Comfy, sturdy set"
reviews.text: We love this seating set! It wasn't difficult to assemble, and looks and feels like good quality that will last! The cushions are very comfy, and I love that it is the Sunbrella fabric. I bought a couple accent pillows and we have the furniture set up around our fire pit, and we think it looks fantastic! Really happy with this purchase so far.
reviews.author: Whateverbecks

reviews.title: "allen + roth Northborough 5-Piece Aluminum Frame"
reviews.text: The love seat front was bent. The assembly was fairly simple, yet the one piece being bent really made it difficult. I would have brought back to exchange but I had already put the whole thing together and didn't want to disassemble and return. I had to redo the threads on the front to get it to stay together. Not what I would imagine having to do after spending nearly $1,500 with the set and table that matched. Otherwise the product was great and we look forward to using this set for many years to come.
reviews.author: JakeC

reviews.title: "Great purchase!"
reviews.text: I was a little skeptical of buying without seeing in the store but with all the good reviews and Lowe's return policy, I figured I didn't have anything to lose. It is a great quality and looks great! You can't really beat it for the price. If you are on the fence, just go for it! You won't be disappointed.
reviews.author: Shawnky

reviews.title: "Best purchase EVER!"
reviews.text: I never write reviews, but after a year with this set and a recent issue with the company replacing the ottoman cushions, I have to say I am extremely pleased with this purchase. I did a lot of research to find a set that was comfortable for lounging, but also versatile enough to serve a meal or sit around and enjoy drinks with my friends and family. This set is everything I was looking for and more. It was easy to assemble, fits nice in the space I had on my deck, is easy to clean, and quite comfortable. What convinced me to write a review, finally, was that my ottoman cushions were ruined by some squirrels and the company was very helpful in getting them replaced. Great quality, great design, WELL DONE!
reviews.author: Reviewer

reviews.title: "Comfortable"
reviews.text: This set has nice plush cushions. The ottomans are multi functional.
reviews.author: Karen

reviews.title: "Beautiful comfortable and affordable"
reviews.text: We absolutely love the furniture! The cushions and thick and comfy and clean very easy. I ended up purchasing another set!
reviews.author: Sue

reviews.title: "Terrible Instructions"
reviews.text: The instructions provided were terrible.  None of the pieces are labled.  You have to get someone good at putting furniture together with no guidance to get it done.  When I sat on the store display set, the cushions were very comfortable and the seating felt very sturdy so that's the only reason I'm rating it a 3 and not a 1.
reviews.author: SCraig

reviews.title: "Difficult to assemble"
reviews.text: The parts for both the chairs and loveseat fit together poorly making it difficult to fasten parts together with provided hardware. There was obviously poor quality control for this product.
reviews.author: RayJ

reviews.title: "Great Outdoor Set"
reviews.text: It is as expected. Not too difficult to assemble. Only one bolt that is difficult to get to on each piece. So far, it has held up great outside. Comfortable to sit at. Heavy enough to stay in place, but not so heavy that it can't be moved. Overall, it is a great set that is exactly what we expected at this price point.
reviews.author: TonyP

reviews.text: This is a great set! I bought a LED solar powered umbrella to go with it. Entertaining next week for Memorial Day- can't wait!!!
reviews.author: HeatherS

reviews.title: "Love this set!"
reviews.text: My husband and I searched high and low and compared many different products before purchasing this set. We live in North Florida so we knew we needed something that would be weather proof. The sunbrella fabric is perfect for Florida and the wicker is holding up quite nicely. For those that left bad reviews because the holes don't match up, this is due to the overtightening of the screws before the chairs are completely aligned and ready to be tightened down. It took us a bit to get them perfectly screwed down, but if you take your time and only loosely screw in each side, you will be fine. Anyone who has put together furniture knows that you cannot overtighten before the products has ben completely built. I especially love the adjustable feet, our patio is a bit uneven, with this feature we were able to make sure the chairs don't rock when they are sat it,
reviews.author: JayT

reviews.title: "Beautiful"
reviews.text: Better than expected. So comfy. Cushions clean beautifully.
reviews.author: GG

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: Milt

reviews.title: "Too small. Not worth the price."
reviews.text: Looks great in picture and in Lowe's but in reality, I should have sat in them before purchasing it. All of the pieces are VERY small- making it very uncomfortable to lounge. (Definitely no room to put pillows on them and to sit). I wouldn't be so upset if this set was in the $600 range- but it's sold for much more. I regretted this as soon as I set them up :(
reviews.author: Jay

reviews.title: "Love!"
reviews.text: Love the look of this Northborough set. Didn't take my husband long to assemble and looks gorgeous. Paired with the Garden Treasures CabaStripe 8x10 rug.
reviews.author: Katiegrace

reviews.title: "Beautiful but...."
reviews.text: The cushions are already sagging and fabric is bunching.  I don't think this a good sign, especially for all the hype and price.  It is a beautiful set but I don't think/believe the cushions will hold up for 1 season, let alone the many we had hoped.  I have contacted manufacturer of the cushions, so will see.  By the way, we have only been able to sit outside a week or so due to CT rain.....protected with covers as well as gazebo....disappointed!
reviews.author: Vicki

reviews.title: "Sturdy and comfortable!"
reviews.text: Picked up our patio set this afternoon, easy assembly and started enjoying our comfortable and relaxing patio set before the sun set.
reviews.author: Jason

reviews.title: "Stylish and functional"
reviews.text: This set is great. We just had company over and ate at the table. Very cozy, comfortable and functional.
reviews.author: Ryan

reviews.title: "Awesome BUT be warned!!!"
reviews.text: The furniture is very nice but as we were unpacking it we quickly found a dozen mice living inside the box!!!   The store offered to take it back or give us a small discount and were very cordial while I yelled at them.  I would advise to have the store assemble the set for you and let them shake out the mice!  yuck
reviews.author: bob

reviews.title: "Patio furniture"
reviews.text: We love the furniture. It was easy to put together and it looks great in the space
reviews.author: Gigi

reviews.title: "Beautiful Dining set"
reviews.text: Assembeled in less than an hour. Makes a beautiful addition to our new patio.
reviews.author: Steve

reviews.title: "Gorgeous and comfy"
reviews.text: So pleased with this set! Cushions are thick and the fabric is durable. The cushions for the ottomans are attached with small bungies at each corner so they won't fall off. The sofa and chairs are super sturdy but it is a two person job to put the set together. We bought the table as well and it is perfect for dining and card playing!
reviews.author: Shan

reviews.title: "Beautiful set"
reviews.text: This set is beautiful, comfortable and is worth every penny!
reviews.author: jwest1374

reviews.title: "Would not recommend"
reviews.text: Arrived via delivery just fine. The major parts that had to be screwed together were machined wrong - the screws were too small for the holes, so it wouldn't stay together. Had to throw the entire mess into the car and drag it back to Lowes for a refund. Not a great way to spend your evening.
reviews.author: CW

reviews.title: "Love it!"
reviews.text: This conversation set is perfect. Love the two ottomans. The seats are comfortable. The cushions are soft. Perfect addition to our new home.
reviews.author: Matt

reviews.title: "good value"
reviews.text: the price/quality ratio is good.  Not high end, per se, but decent quality.
reviews.author: DavMat3

reviews.title: "Patio furniture"
reviews.text: The free delivery was awesome.  It took about an hour to put together, but the key is to use a drill.  I took an old Allen wrench and cut the tip off and used it to tighten all the screws down. The pillows were firm, the sunbrella material was easy to keep clean.
reviews.author: Juan

reviews.title: "Comfortable furniture"
reviews.text: Easy to assemble, just make sure not to tighten the bolts before all of them are installed, some parts have an alignment issue.  Other than that, the set went together in about 40 minutes.Very comfortable.
reviews.author: JET

reviews.title: "Looks Great"
reviews.text: Other than one misaligned screw hole it was very easy to assemble and although it recommended 2 people I was able to do it solo.Nice result
reviews.author: Thierry

reviews.title: "Great set"
reviews.text: Lightweight, easy to assemble.  Looks great and very comfortable
reviews.author: AAS

reviews.title: "Lovely Set"
reviews.text: Easy to assemble, sturdy and comfortable. We are thrilled!
reviews.author: Mdjohnso

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: Mel

reviews.title: "Great purchase"
reviews.text: Nothing overly fancy but great value and comfortable with paying 2K.
reviews.author: Tescott

reviews.title: "Great Set - Damaged Righ Panel"
reviews.text: Great comfortable patio set.  When I was putting it together one of the right panels (part B) was bent.  I called the company right away and they rushed a new panel to my home.  Great customer service.  I would recommend using hex key set when putting the set together as the tool provided for install is difficult in tight spaces and painful on the hand.
reviews.author: Mike

reviews.title: "Perfect Set"
reviews.text: We bought this for our side deck. it is the perfect size for what we were looking for. a lot of sets either had low backs or cheap cushions.  this had neither of those problems.  Chairs were cery easy to assemble. Highly recomend
reviews.author: Charles

reviews.title: "Great Deck Furniture"
reviews.text: Easy to assemble so we are able to enjoy it right away. Very comfortable and relaxing to sit on. The construction seems solid and durable. We plan on enjoying it for many years to come.
reviews.author: Jim

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: Eli

reviews.text: Excellent product for an excellent price. Looks and is very comfortable. It is a quality product and will last for years if one takes care of it
reviews.author: Debbie

reviews.title: "Stylish and Comfortable"
reviews.text: Patio set arrived and it is very good looking on my deck.  The two separable foot stools allows variable arrangements and maximum comfort.
reviews.author: TheCaptain

reviews.title: "Patio set"
reviews.text: It is a beautiful set and very confortable.  Very pleased.
reviews.author: Larry

reviews.text: Highly recommend!  Looks great in my mars. Thanks Lowe's!
reviews.author: Liz

reviews.title: "Great set"
reviews.text: Good quality and good looking. Easy to put together.
reviews.author: Meridainguy

reviews.title: "Great Product and really liked it"
reviews.text: It really fits in to the patio and very comfortable.
reviews.author: Chirag

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.

questions.question: "So the description says the cushions are Sunbrella material. Are they or not?"
questions.author: Denise

answers.author: Praches
answers.text: I just received my entire set in the mail and the cushions do say Sunbrella. Love the entire set!

answers.author: Jo
answers.text: Yes, they are sunbrella and even better, the covers ZIP OFF and are machine washable!. That's what sold me on this set.

answers.author: Letright
answers.text: Hi Denise, Yes, they are. The cushions of this set are made of Sunbrella fabric.

answers.author: Letright
answers.text: Yes, the cushion cover is Sunbrella material - Acrylic.

questions.question: "Has anyone had difficulty assembling? The holes do not align.. anyone experience this?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: Barbara
answers.text: Yes. I just started assembling my set. I wish the instructions stated clearly the order in which to attach the pieces. If that had been clearer, I would have gotten farther than just one chair, but on this one chair, there is one hole so drastically misaligned that the screw will not go into the threaded hole at all. There's all kinds of messy welding around the screw holes, so it's clear the precision is not there. But the metal is very sturdy and the welding of the parts seems strong. On the whole, the quality of the set is so good, for the price, that I will be heading to the hardware store for nuts and bolts to put where the provided hardware does not fit.

answers.author: Brian
answers.text: I just finished putting my set together, and there were some holes that I had to work on, alternating tightening with a hand tool and electric drill. I think the issue is not the holes as being sure the frames aren't bent. You find out for sure when you have to level the legs.

answers.author: Letright
answers.text: Please contact our customer service if you had any problem with setting it up. Thanks!

questions.question: "How does this set hold up in the rain? Can it be stored outside with a cover?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: RPWThree
answers.text: The get soaked in the rain. Spent two days trying to get them dried out after a storm. I suggest covers

answers.author: West
answers.text: The cushions get SOAKED in the rain without a cover.

answers.author: CommunityAnswer
answers.text: This set is rust resistant and weather resistant. It can hold up against the elements including the rain. It can be stored with or without a cover.

questions.question: "How do you connect the cushions of the footstool to the bases?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: West
answers.text: There is a toggle like button on the cushion the slips through a stretchy elastic like loop on the ottoman base. Very easy and then secure.

answers.author: Letright
answers.text: there are buttons on cushion and ties on ottoman to connect together

questions.question: "Why do the cushion tags say "Sunbrella" and yet the fabric content here says "acrylic Olefin." Are Sunbrella fabrics made of Olefin?"
questions.author: JL

answers.author: JL
answers.text: Katrina. Thanks for your answer. I am still confused as the Lowe's Manager Wayne at Ray Road store, Phoenix, says this product's cushions are Olefin and NOT the usual marine-grade Sunbrella fabric used and that it was "probably" made that way by Sunbrella as special order for Lowes. He also said the 5 year limited warranty on this item refers to to the base aluminimum frame of these pieces and has nothing to do with the fabric or cushions. Is that true or not, do you know? I know this fabric doesn't "feel" like the other Sunbrella pillows I have always purchased--seems softer and less plastic feel, so is it Olefin or not?

answers.author: Letright
answers.text: Sunbrella is a fabric brand, not material, the fabric is made of Acrylic, which is higher quality than Olefin, in color fastness, strength, water resistant etc. The fabric content is being corrected to acrylic, but not synchronized to .com yet.

questions.question: "what is the thickness of the cushions?"
questions.author: Lorraine

answers.author: ilovecondiments
answers.text: That is 3.5 to 3.9 inches.

answers.author: Letright
answers.text: It is 9-10 cm between the pipings.

questions.question: "Will the chairs ever be sold individually? Would be perfect for a patio but don't need the couch and ottomans..."
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: CommunityAnswer
answers.text: As of now, it can't be purchased separately.

questions.question: "I bought this set and wanted to know if I can buy an additional loveseat?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: Letright
answers.text: thank you for purchasing the Northborough seating. Sold the loveseat individually is a good suggestion, thank you, but not available now yet.

questions.question: "I have the set. Wondering if i can buy just the love seat"
questions.author: bp

answers.author: Letright
answers.text: thank you for purchasing the Northborough seating. Sold the loveseat individually is a good suggestion, thank you, but not available now yet.

questions.question: "What size of Outdoor Furniture cover would fit this set?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: Letright
answers.text: if you only buy the 5 pc. set without table, the cover should be greater than 65"x65"x30" ( from top to bottom) if table(item 871290) includes. the cover dimension our suggestion is 68" x 110" x 30" ( from top to bottom)
